thread.title: Germano Gil

author: Germano Gil
title: Germano Gil
text:
It was my first buy at FC Moto and the only thing that went wrong was the size table that was presented. Conclusion, i follow the indications of sizes and in the end i receive socks for kids. The sizes are one of the fundamental things for people who buys from internet, so it must have clear information about that. The information that appears is general, not specific for that product. â€‹If the manufacturer have a size table for that product, create a direct link in the page.
All the rest went right.
Thanks
